node.detail_zh: 患者居於麗港城，3 月 10 日進入檢疫中心時有發燒症狀，轉到聯合醫院，夫婦二人與女兒同住，潛伏期曾到藍田公園和麗港公園做運動或到附近超市買菜。
node.detail_en: The patient lives in Laguna City, and was having fever on Mar 10 when entering quarantine centre.   He was then transferred to United Christian Hospital.  The patient and his spouse lives with his daughter.  They went to Lam Tin Park and Laguna Park for exercise or nearby supermarkets.
node.group_description_zh: 新華旅遊埃及旅行團全部八名團友及一名領隊，回港後九人全確診。由於該團四名男團友均是現任或退休的食環署巡察員，被稱為「食環埃及團」。
node.group_description_en: 8 tourists and 1 tour guide under a Sunflower Travel group tour to Egypt were all confirmed with diagnoses upon return to HK. 4 male of the tour group are currently or formerly employed by FEHD.

node.remarks_zh: 患者為個案 126 的妻子，二人為埃及旅行團團友，過往健康良好
node.remarks_en: Patient is patient no 126's wife, they were both in the Egypt tour group and both have good past health.

node.remarks_zh: 參與一個共 8 人的新華旅行團到埃及旅遊
node.remarks_en: Travelled to Egypt in a tour group of 8

node.location_zh: 土耳其航空 TK695 ( 經濟艙 )
node.location_en: Turkish Airlines flight TK695 (economy class cabin)
node.remarks_zh: 由埃及開羅到土耳其伊斯坦堡

node.location_zh: 土耳其航空 TK70 ( 經濟艙 )
node.location_en: Turkish Airlines flight TK70 (economy class cabin)

node.remarks_zh: 被送往檢疫中心接受檢疫前發現發燒，遂被安排入院接受治療
node.remarks_en: Patient was found to have developed fever before sending to the quarantine centre hence sent to hospital for treatment.
